ToursPage.subtitle: Explore the world with expert local guides and authentic adventures
ToursPage.tourTypesSubtitle: Choose from diverse tour experiences tailored to your interests
ToursPage.destinationsSubtitle: Discover tours in the world's most exciting destinations
ToursPage.durationsSubtitle: Choose the perfect tour duration for your schedule
ToursPage.includedSubtitle: Know what to expect before you book
ToursPage.operatorsSubtitle: Book with confidence from trusted tour providers
ToursPage.tipsSubtitle: Save money and enhance your experience with insider knowledge
ToursPage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about booking tours with Fly2Any
ToursPage.tourTypes_cityTours_desc: Explore urban landmarks, culture, and history with local guides
ToursPage.tourTypes_cityTours_examples: NYC Walking Tour, Paris City Highlights, Tokyo Street Food
ToursPage.tourTypes_adventure_desc: Thrilling outdoor activities and adrenaline-pumping experiences
ToursPage.tourTypes_adventure_examples: Grand Canyon Hiking, Costa Rica Zip-line, Patagonia Trekking
ToursPage.tourTypes_foodWine_desc: Taste local cuisine, wine, and culinary traditions
ToursPage.tourTypes_foodWine_examples: Tuscany Wine Tour, Tokyo Food Walk, Barcelona Tapas Experience
ToursPage.tourTypes_cultural_desc: Immerse in local traditions, art, and heritage sites
ToursPage.tourTypes_cultural_examples: Rome Ancient Tour, Kyoto Temples, Marrakech Medina Walk
ToursPage.tourTypes_natureWildlife_desc: Discover natural wonders and observe wildlife in their habitat
ToursPage.tourTypes_natureWildlife_examples: African Safari, Amazon Jungle Tour, Galapagos Wildlife
ToursPage.tourTypes_multiDay_desc: Extended journeys combining multiple destinations and activities
ToursPage.tourTypes_multiDay_examples: Iceland Ring Road, Peru Machu Picchu Trek, European Grand Tour
ToursPage.duration_halfDay_desc: Perfect for quick explorations and fitting multiple activities in one day
ToursPage.duration_halfDay_examples: Morning city walk, afternoon food tour, sunset boat cruise
ToursPage.duration_fullDay_desc: Comprehensive experiences with meals and multiple stops included
ToursPage.duration_fullDay_examples: Day trip to nearby city, full museum tour with lunch, wine region visit
ToursPage.duration_multiDay_desc: Extended journeys with accommodations, meals, and transportation
ToursPage.duration_multiDay_examples: Week-long safari, European tour package, trekking expedition
ToursPage.included_guide_desc: Professional, knowledgeable guides fluent in multiple languages
ToursPage.included_transport_desc: Comfortable vehicles, public transit tickets, or bike rentals
ToursPage.included_entrance_desc: Skip-the-line access to museums, monuments, and attractions
ToursPage.included_meals_desc: Lunch, snacks, water, or food tastings depending on tour type
ToursPage.tip_bookEarly_desc: Famous attractions like Vatican Museums or Machu Picchu fill up weeks in advance. Book 2-4 weeks ahead.
ToursPage.tip_cancellation_desc: Look for tours with free cancellation up to 24-48 hours before. Weather or schedule changes happen.
ToursPage.tip_reviews_desc: Focus on reviews from the last 3-6 months. Tour quality, guides, and routes can change over time.
ToursPage.tip_smallGroup_desc: Groups of 8-15 people offer better interaction with guides and more personalized experiences.
ToursPage.tip_checkIncluded_desc: Verify if entrance fees, meals, transportation, and gratuities are included to avoid surprises.
ToursPage.tip_skipLine_desc: Save hours at popular attractions. Skip-the-line access is worth the extra $10-20 in most cases.
ToursPage.faq_cancellation_q: What is the cancellation policy for tours?
ToursPage.faq_cancellation_a: Most tours offer free cancellation if you cancel 24-48 hours before the start time. Some popular tours may have stricter policies (72 hours). Always check the specific tour's cancellation terms before booking. Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days.
ToursPage.faq_tipping_q: Are tour guides tipped? How much should I tip?
ToursPage.faq_tipping_a: Tipping is customary in most countries and not included in the tour price. Standard tips are 10-20% of the tour cost or $5-10 per person for half-day tours, $10-20 for full-day tours. For exceptional service, you can tip more. Some operators include a tip suggestion in their confirmation email.
ToursPage.faq_weather_q: What happens if the weather is bad?
ToursPage.faq_weather_a: Most outdoor tours operate rain or shine, though extreme weather (storms, heavy snow) may lead to cancellations. Tour operators will notify you in advance and offer a full refund or alternative date. Indoor tours are rarely affected. Check the weather forecast and dress appropriately.
ToursPage.faq_mobility_q: Can I join a tour if I have mobility issues?
ToursPage.faq_mobility_a: Many tours offer wheelchair accessibility or modified routes for guests with mobility limitations. Check the tour description for "wheelchair accessible" or "mobility friendly" labels. Contact the operator directly to discuss your specific needs before booking.
ToursPage.faq_meals_q: Are meals included in tour prices?
ToursPage.faq_meals_a: It depends on the tour type. Food tours include tastings and meals. Full-day tours often include lunch. Half-day tours typically don't include meals. Always check "What's Included" section in the tour description. Bring snacks and water if unsure.
ToursPage.faq_meetingPoint_q: How do I find my tour guide on the day of the tour?
ToursPage.faq_meetingPoint_a: Your confirmation email will have meeting point details (address, landmark) and guide identification (holding a sign, wearing specific clothing). Arrive 10-15 minutes early. Many tours provide a phone number to call if you can't find the guide. Use Google Maps to navigate to the meeting point.

ActivitiesPage.subtitle: From adventure sports to cultural workshops, create unforgettable memories

ActivitiesPage.destinationsSubtitle: Discover activities in the world's most exciting destinations
ActivitiesPage.durationsSubtitle: Choose the perfect activity duration for your schedule
ActivitiesPage.includedSubtitle: Know what to expect before you book
ActivitiesPage.providersSubtitle: Book with confidence from trusted activity providers
ActivitiesPage.tipsSubtitle: Save money and enhance your experience with insider knowledge
ActivitiesPage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about booking activities with Fly2Any
ActivitiesPage.activityType_adventureSports_desc: Adrenaline-pumping activities from skydiving to bungee jumping
ActivitiesPage.activityType_adventureSports_examples: Dubai Skydive, Queenstown Bungee, Swiss Paragliding
ActivitiesPage.activityType_waterActivities_desc: Explore oceans, lakes, and rivers with exciting water sports
ActivitiesPage.activityType_waterActivities_examples: Bali Surf Lessons, Maldives Diving, Hawaii Snorkeling
ActivitiesPage.activityType_culturalWorkshops_desc: Learn local crafts, cooking, and traditional arts from experts
ActivitiesPage.activityType_culturalWorkshops_examples: Thai Cooking Class, Japanese Pottery, Flamenco Dance
ActivitiesPage.activityType_outdoorAdventures_desc: Hiking, camping, and nature exploration activities
ActivitiesPage.activityType_outdoorAdventures_examples: Grand Canyon Hike, Alps Climbing, Costa Rica Zip-line
ActivitiesPage.activityType_wellnessSpa_desc: Relaxation activities including yoga, meditation, and spa treatments
ActivitiesPage.activityType_wellnessSpa_examples: Bali Yoga Retreat, Iceland Hot Springs, Thai Massage
ActivitiesPage.activityType_entertainmentShows_desc: Live performances, concerts, and cultural entertainment
ActivitiesPage.activityType_entertainmentShows_examples: Broadway Shows, Moulin Rouge, Cirque du Soleil
ActivitiesPage.duration_quick_desc: Short experiences perfect for filling gaps in your itinerary
ActivitiesPage.duration_quick_examples: City bike rental, cooking demo, quick spa treatment
ActivitiesPage.duration_halfDay_desc: Morning or afternoon experiences with guided instruction
ActivitiesPage.duration_halfDay_examples: Cooking class, surf lesson, art workshop, city tour
ActivitiesPage.duration_fullDay_desc: Complete immersive experiences with meals and equipment included
ActivitiesPage.duration_fullDay_examples: Desert safari, diving expedition, hiking trip, multi-activity package
ActivitiesPage.included_instruction_desc: Certified instructors and guides for safe, enjoyable experiences
ActivitiesPage.included_equipment_desc: All necessary equipment, safety gear, and materials provided
ActivitiesPage.included_transport_desc: Hotel pickup, drop-off, or meeting point instructions
ActivitiesPage.included_photos_desc: Professional photos or videos of your experience
ActivitiesPage.tip_checkWeather_desc: Many outdoor activities are weather-dependent. Check forecasts and cancellation policies for rainy days.
ActivitiesPage.tip_bookAhead_desc: Popular experiences like skydiving or cooking classes can fill up weeks in advance. Book 1-2 weeks ahead.
ActivitiesPage.tip_ageRestrictions_desc: Many activities have minimum age, weight, or fitness requirements. Check before booking to avoid disappointment.
ActivitiesPage.tip_groupDiscounts_desc: Many providers offer 10-20% discounts for groups of 4+. Ask about group rates when booking.
ActivitiesPage.tip_readReviews_desc: Focus on reviews from the last 3-6 months. Activity quality and instructors can change over time.
ActivitiesPage.tip_insuranceCheck_desc: Verify if your travel insurance covers adventure activities. Some require additional coverage for high-risk sports.
ActivitiesPage.faq_cancellation_q: What is the cancellation policy for activities?
ActivitiesPage.faq_cancellation_a: Most activities offer free cancellation 24-48 hours before the start time. Weather-dependent activities typically offer full refunds if canceled due to unsafe conditions. Always check the specific activity's cancellation terms.
ActivitiesPage.faq_fitness_q: Do I need to be fit for adventure activities?
ActivitiesPage.faq_fitness_a: It depends on the activity. Most providers clearly state fitness requirements. Hiking and climbing need moderate fitness, while activities like cooking classes or spa treatments have no requirements. Contact the provider if unsure.
ActivitiesPage.faq_whatToBring_q: What should I bring to an activity?
ActivitiesPage.faq_whatToBring_a: Check the activity description for specific requirements. Common items: comfortable clothes, sunscreen, water bottle, closed-toe shoes for active experiences. Most providers supply specialized equipment.
ActivitiesPage.faq_ageRestrictions_q: Are there age restrictions for activities?
ActivitiesPage.faq_ageRestrictions_a: Yes, many activities have minimum age requirements. Adventure sports typically require participants to be 12-18+. Family-friendly activities welcome all ages. Check "Age Requirements" in the activity description.
ActivitiesPage.faq_groupBooking_q: Can I book activities for large groups?
ActivitiesPage.faq_groupBooking_a: Absolutely! Many providers offer group discounts for 4+ people. For groups of 10+, contact the provider directly for custom arrangements and better pricing. Book well in advance for large groups.
ActivitiesPage.faq_meetingPoint_q: How do I find the meeting point?
ActivitiesPage.faq_meetingPoint_a: Your confirmation email will include meeting point details (address, GPS coordinates, landmarks) and what to look for (guide with sign, specific clothing). Arrive 10-15 minutes early. Most providers offer a contact number.

PackagesPage.subtitle: Save up to 40% with flight + hotel + activities bundled deals
PackagesPage.packageType_beachVacation_desc: All-inclusive beach resorts with flights, meals, and activities
PackagesPage.packageType_cityBreak_desc: Urban adventures with flights, hotels, and sightseeing tours
PackagesPage.packageType_cityBreak_examples: Paris, New York, Tokyo, Dubai City Breaks
PackagesPage.packageType_adventure_desc: Thrilling experiences with extreme sports and nature exploration
PackagesPage.packageType_adventure_examples: New Zealand Adventure, Costa Rica Explorer, Iceland Trek
PackagesPage.packageType_cruise_desc: Ocean voyages with flights, cabin, meals, and entertainment
PackagesPage.packageType_cruise_examples: Mediterranean Cruise, Caribbean Cruise, Alaska Cruise
PackagesPage.packageType_safari_desc: Wildlife adventures with luxury lodges and game drives
PackagesPage.packageType_safari_examples: Kenya Safari, Tanzania Serengeti, South Africa Big Five
PackagesPage.packageType_ski_desc: Winter sports with flights, ski resorts, and lift passes
PackagesPage.packageType_ski_examples: Swiss Alps, Aspen, Whistler, Japan Powder
PackagesPage.duration_weekendGetaway_desc: Perfect for quick escapes and short city breaks
PackagesPage.duration_weekendGetaway_examples: City tours, beach weekends, spa retreats
PackagesPage.duration_weekLong_desc: Ideal balance of relaxation and exploration
PackagesPage.duration_weekLong_examples: Beach resorts, Europe tours, island hopping
PackagesPage.included_flights_desc: Economy or premium class flights from your city
PackagesPage.included_accommodation_desc: Hotels, resorts, or vacation rentals for your stay
PackagesPage.included_meals_desc: Breakfast, all-inclusive, or meal vouchers included
PackagesPage.tip_bundleSavings_desc: Book flight + hotel + car together to save 30-40% vs booking separately
PackagesPage.tip_checkIncluded_desc: Verify meals, transfers, activities to avoid hidden costs and surprises
PackagesPage.tip_offSeason_desc: Travel during shoulder season for same quality at 50% less cost
PackagesPage.tip_readDetails_desc: Check cancellation policy, room type, flight times before booking
PackagesPage.tip_compareProviders_desc: Same destination can vary $500+ between different package providers
PackagesPage.tip_addedValue_desc: Free upgrades, resort credits, late checkout add real value to packages
PackagesPage.faq_savings_q: How much can I save with a vacation package?
PackagesPage.faq_savings_a: Vacation packages typically save you 25-40% compared to booking flights, hotels, and activities separately. The more components you bundle, the greater the savings. Packages also often include added perks like resort credits, free breakfast, or complimentary transfers.
PackagesPage.faq_included_q: What's typically included in a package?
PackagesPage.faq_included_a: Most packages include round-trip flights and accommodation. Depending on the package type, you may also get meals (all-inclusive), airport transfers, activities, tours, and travel insurance. Always check the "What's Included" section for specific details.
PackagesPage.faq_customize_a: Yes! Most providers allow customization. You can usually upgrade your flight class, choose different hotels, add extra nights, include car rentals, or add excursions. Customizations may affect the package price.
PackagesPage.faq_bestTime_q: When is the best time to book a package?
PackagesPage.faq_bestTime_a: Book 3-4 months in advance for international destinations and 6-8 weeks for domestic trips. Watch for flash sales during off-season, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and Travel Tuesday. Last-minute deals (2-3 weeks out) can also offer significant savings if you're flexible.
PackagesPage.faq_refundable_a: Refund policies vary by provider and package type. Standard packages often have cancellation fees, while flexible packages cost more but allow free cancellation. Travel insurance is recommended for protection against unexpected changes. Always read the cancellation policy before booking.
PackagesPage.faq_insurance_q: Do I need travel insurance with a package?
PackagesPage.faq_insurance_a: While not mandatory, travel insurance is highly recommended for packages, especially for expensive trips or international travel. It protects against trip cancellations, medical emergencies, lost luggage, and flight delays. Many packages offer insurance as an add-on during booking.
